# Emanuele Faraci — Portfolio

> Fullstack developer and automation builder based in Modena, Italy.

## About

Emanuele Faraci is a Computer Science student at UNIMORE and an independent developer specializing in fullstack web development, AI integrations, and bot automations. He builds polished, responsive web experiences with Next.js and React, backend services with Python and FastAPI, and intelligent bots for Telegram and Discord.

## Skills

- **Frontend**: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, HTML/CSS, Vite, Vercel
- **Backend**: Python, FastAPI, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, REST APIs, Webhooks
- **AI & ML**: OpenAI, Google GenAI, LangChain, Hugging Face, Model fine-tuning, RAG, AI agents, Image generation
- **Bots & Automation**: Telegram API, Discord.js, Python Discord, Cron jobs, Chatbots, Automation pipelines
- **DevOps & Infra**: Nginx, UFW, Cloudflare, VPS setup, Linux, Docker, CI/CD

## Projects

- **Portfolio Website** — Built with Next.js, showcasing projects and skills in a modern design. [Live](https://emanuelefaraci.com/)
- **Humanlike Telegram Bot** — Highly realistic AI Telegram bot powered by Google GenAI API with natural message splitting and dynamic typing delays.
- **Project BEA** — Instagram DM automation with AI persona, mimicking human behavior with realistic delays and typing simulation.
- **Minesweeper** — A minesweeper game with cheats, built with React and TypeScript. [Live](https://minesweeper.emanuelefaraci.com/)
- **AllConverter** — Local file converter web app supporting image, audio, video, and document conversions. [Live](https://allconverter.emanuelefaraci.com/)
- **Markolino-Chaos** — A Paper plugin that spawns a bot in Minecraft.
- **Simple Web Scraper** — Modular Python web scraper with automatic content extraction and structured JSON output.
- **Quick ResourcePack Mod** — Fabric mod for Minecraft with keybind to switch texture packs. [Modrinth](https://modrinth.com/mod/quick-resource-pack)
